description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. You have awoken deep inside a pitch dark dungeon. Use your sense of sound to navigate the darkness avoiding traps, fighting demons, and uncovering treasures.
description.short: You have awoken deep inside a pitch dark dungeon. Use your sense of sound to navigate the darkness avoiding traps, fighting demons, and uncovering treasures.
